message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $1,000,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1,000,000 is significantly below what I believe the product is worth.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,200,000.  This is a very competitive price for something of this value.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $1,100,000.
